docs.lead_paragraph: At Lincoln Hospital, Dr. Fernando Jara runs what may be the single busiest emergency room in New York City, which handled a staggering 173,000 visits in 2013.

headline.seo: Lincoln Hospital’s Emergency Room May Be New York City’s Busiest
headline.main: Cool and Calm at Center of an E.R. Maelstrom in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Cool and Calm at the Center of an Emergency Room Maelstrom

docs.abstract: Lincoln Hospital in the South Bronx may be single busiest emergency room in New York City, handling 173,000 visits in 2013; emergency medicine department chairman, Dr Fernando Jara, is often found working 12-hour shifts, juggling patients while running department.
docs.snippet: At Lincoln Hospital, Dr. Fernando Jara runs what may be the single busiest emergency room in New York City, which handled a staggering 173,000 visits in 2013.
